00004 #include "ndarray/tables_fwd.hpp"
00005 #include "ndarray/tables/detail/FieldInfo.hpp"
00006 
00007 #include <boost/intrusive_ptr.hpp>
00008 
00009 namespace ndarray { namespace tables { namespace detail {
00010 
00011 template <typename T>
00012 struct TraitsAccess<T,false> {
00013     typedef typename Traits<T>::FieldSequence FieldSequence;
00014     typedef Layout<T> Layout_;
00015     typedef Row<T> Row_;
00016     typedef Table<T> Table_;
00017     typedef unsigned char Raw;
00018     typedef detail::Columns<T> Columns_;
00019     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr< detail::Columns<T> > ColumnsPtr;
00020 
00021     template <int N>
00022     struct Fields {
00023         typedef typename boost::fusion::result_of::value_at_c<FieldSequence,N>::type Type;
00024         typedef FieldInfo<Type> Info;
00025         typedef typename Info::template Qualified<false> Qualified;
00026     };
00027 
00028 };
00029 
00030 template <typename T>
00031 struct TraitsAccess<T,true> {
00032     typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type U;
00033     typedef typename Traits<T>::FieldSequence FieldSequence;
00034     typedef Layout<U> Layout_;
00035     typedef Row<T> Row_;
00036     typedef Table<T> Table_;
00037     typedef unsigned char const Raw;
00038     typedef detail::Columns<U> Columns_;
00039     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr< detail::Columns<U> > ColumnsPtr;
00040 
00041     template <int N>
00042     struct Fields {
00043         typedef typename boost::fusion::result_of::value_at_c<FieldSequence,N>::type Type;
00044         typedef FieldInfo<Type> Info;
00045         typedef typename Info::template Qualified<true> Qualified;
00046     };
00047 };

00049 }}} // namespace ndarray::tables::detail
